Sponge as a sustainable cleaning tool: Sponge can be used to clean various surfaces, including floors, countertops, and appliances, without the need for harsh chemicals.
Sponge as a natural exfoliator: Sponge can be used to scrub and exfoliate the skin, removing dead skin cells and promoting healthy skin.
Sponge as a pet bed: Sponge can be used as a soft and comfortable bed for pets, providing a cushioned surface for them to rest on.
Sponge as a decorative element: Sponge can be used as a creative decoration in homes, adding color and texture to walls, furniture, and other surfaces.
Sponge as a natural remedy for headaches: Sponge can be used to absorb excessive moisture from the head and reduce the risk of headaches caused by dampness.
